name: Sneak Out (itch)
description:
Do you manage to sneak your way out ?

This is Blop he wants to be a agent, but to prove that he is suitable for this job he has to complete the simulaton. in the simulation there are invisible platforms, but whith blobs special ability, the Sneak view ,  he is able to see this platforms for some time. 

This game was made for the  PB Game jam 4. 

There are curently 5 levels in the game, but if needet i can do some more levels.

I had fun making this game and i hope that you have fun playing this game.

Some feed back would be great :)
